text: Jason Upton (born December 15, 1973) is an independent Christian worship leader and musician. He has a large underground following. He has released 12 albums since the year 2000: *Key of David (2000) *Faith (2001) *Jacob's Dream (2002) *Dying Star (2002) *Remember (2003) *Trusting the Angels (2004) *Great River Road (2005) *Open Up the Earth (2005) *Beautiful People (2007) *Between Earth and Sky (2007) *1200 FT Below Sea Level (2008) *On the Rim of the Visible World (2009) w/ the Good Land Band Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Minneapolis Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Christian music singers
title: Jason Upton
